cards.title: Weaver
cards.powers: {Weaver} deals 1 target 1 Projectile damage. That target deals 1 less damage until the start of Weaver's next turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now
Reduce the damage dealt to Hero character by 1 until the start of your next turn

openingLines.default: The Threads all end here! You [i]must[/i] be stopped!

cards.title: Inertia Conduit Suit
body: Play next to a Hero Character card.
A Hero may only have one Suit next to them at a time. If another suit would be put in play, return all but 1 suit to Weaver's hand.
If the equipped hero takes 5 or more damage in one blow, destroy this suit.
Increase damage dealt by the equipped hero to Non-Hero targets by 1

cards.title: Kevlar Shell Suit
body: Play next to a Hero Character card.
A Hero may only have one Suit next to them at a time. If another suit would be put in play, return all but 1 suit to Weaver's hand.
If the equipped hero takes 5 or more damage in one blow, destroy this suit.
Reduce damage dealt to this hero by 1

cards.title: Akashaweave
body: Play next to a suit.
A Suit may only have 1 Material in play next to it at a time. If another Material is played next to it, return the others to Weaver's Hand.
If the suit ever leaves play, destroy this card.
At the end of this Hero's turn, they regain 1 HP

cards.title: Hasteweave
body: Play next to a suit.
A Suit may only have 1 Material in play next to it at a time. If another Material is played next to it, return the others to Weaver's Hand.
If the suit ever leaves play, destroy this card.
This hero may play an additional card.
cards.flavorText: Woven from the Rush of Velocity

cards.title: Adrenalweave
body: Play next to a suit.
A Suit may only have 1 Material in play next to it at a time. If another Material is played next to it, return the others to Weaver's Hand.
If the suit ever leaves play, destroy this card.
This Hero may use an additional Power
cards.flavorText: Woven from an Essence of Mana

cards.title: Psychweave
body: Play next to a suit.
A Suit may only have 1 Material in play next to it at a time. If another Material is played next to it, return the others to Weaver's Hand.
If the suit ever leaves play, destroy this card.
This Hero may draw an additional card
cards.flavorText: Woven from Thoughts of the Future

cards.title: Phaseweave
body: Play next to a suit.
A Suit may only have 1 Material in play next to it at a time. If another Material is played next to it, return the others to Weaver's Hand.
If the suit ever leaves play, destroy this card.
Damage dealt by this hero is irreducible

cards.title: Spool the Thread
body: Draw 4 cards.
Discard 2 cards
cards.flavorText: I need my finest thread, Sixty-Three!

cards.title: Raid the Stockpiles
body: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Suits or Materials. Put them in your hand, shuffle the rest back into your deck
You may play a card.
cards.flavorText: I know it was in here somewhere!

cards.title: Quick Patchwork
body: When one of your equipment cards would be destroyed, you may discard a Material to prevent it.
powers: You may discard a material. If you do, you may put a Suit from your trash into play.
cards.flavorText: This should be a quick patch

cards.title: Premade Masterpiece
body: You may play a Suit
You may play a Material
You may play a card
cards.flavorText: I made it ahead of time.

cards.title: Read the Weave
body: At the start of each turn, Weaver may deal herself 1 Psychic damage. If she does, look at the top 2 cards of any deck and put them back in any order.
If Book of Fate is in play, look at the top 4
At the start if your turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: By reading the Seams of the Universe{BR}I can influence the future.

cards.title: Inspiration Strikes
powers: You may deal up to 3 targets 1 Projectile damage. For each target dealt damage this way, you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I just had a wonderous idea

cards.title: Resource Reclamation
body: When one of your equipments is destroyed, you may draw a card.

cards.title: Book of Fate
body: The first time you play a Weave each turn, you may use a power.
powers: Look at the top 3 cards of any deck and put them back in any order.
cards.flavorText: More than samples, dear,{BR}It's the story of us.

cards.title: Loom Of Fate
body: At the start of your turn, you may put a Suit or Material from your trash into your hand.
powers: You may play a Suit or Material
cards.flavorText: That loom can rewrite fate itself!

cards.title: Divine Needles
body: Increase Projectile Damage dealt by Weaver by 1.
powers: You may deal up to 3 targets 1 Irreducible Projectile damage. Targets dealt damage this way deal 1 less damage until the start of your next turn.
cards.flavorText: Careful, they can rip the universe

cards.title: Anansi
body: At the start of your turn, {Anansi} deals himself 2 Psychic damage.
Suits are indestructible
powers: You may search your deck for a Suit or Material and put it into play, then Anansi deals himself 2 Psychic damage.
